com.fxgraph.graph

Interface IGraphNode

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ICell, IEdge, SequenceDiagram.IActorCell, SequenceDiagram.IMessageEdge
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCell, AbstractEdge, CorneredEdge, CorneredLoopEdge, DoubleCorneredEdge, Edge, MessageEdge, RectangleCell, SequenceDiagram.ActorCell, TriangleCell

    public interface IGraphNode
    An interface that anything must implement in order to be displayed in a Graph. Edges and cells implement this interface.
    Author:
    sirolf2009, ogallagher (javadoc)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javafx.scene.layout.Region getGraphic(Graph graph)
      Get the graphic that will represent the graph node when displayed.
      default void onAddedToGraph(Graph graph, javafx.scene.layout.Region region)
      Handler for this node being added to a graph.
      default void onRemovedFromGraph(Graph graph, javafx.scene.layout.Region region)
      Handler for when this node is removed from a graph.

    • Method Detail

      • getGraphic

        javafx.scene.layout.Region getGraphic(Graph graph)
        Get the graphic that will represent the graph node when displayed.
        Parameters:
        graph - The graph that this node is a member of.
        Returns:
        The fx node used to display the graph node.

      • onAddedToGraph

        default void onAddedToGraph(Graph graph,
                            javafx.scene.layout.Region region)
        Handler for this node being added to a graph.
        Parameters:
        graph - The graph to which the graph node will be added.
        region - The fx node used to display the graph node.

      • onRemovedFromGraph

        default void onRemovedFromGraph(Graph graph,
                                javafx.scene.layout.Region region)
        Handler for when this node is removed from a graph.
        Parameters:
        graph - The graph from which the graph node will be removed.
        region - The fx node used to display the graph node.
